multiblock.validation.reactor.invalid_fu: Fuel Rods may only be placed in the Reactor's interior
multiblock.validation.reactor.invalid_pa: This Reactor part may not be placed in the Reactor's interior
multiblock.validation.reactor.invalid_bl: %1$s is not valid for the Reactor's interior
%1$s is not valid for the Reactor's exterior
multiblock.validation.reactor.too_few_ro: Not enough Control Rods. Reactors require at least one
multiblock.validation.reactor.too_few_co: Not enough Controllers. Reactors require at least one
multiblock.validation.reactor.invalid_co: Control Rods may only be placed at the end of a sequence of Fuel Rods
Control Rods may only be placed on one side of the Reactor
multiblock.validation.reactor.invalid_fr: Only casing may be used as part of a Reactor's frame
multiblock.validation.reactor.invalid_bl: Only fuel rods can be used here
multiblock.validation.reactor.invalid_ba: Only Reactor Casings can be used here
multiblock.validation.reactor.invalid_fu: All Fuel Rods must belong to a fuel assembly behind a Control Rod
multiblock.validation.reactor.mixed_powe: Only one type of energy system can be used in a Reactor
multiblock.validation.turbine.invalid_be: A Rotor Bearing can only be placed on a face of the Turbine
multiblock.validation.turbine.too_few_co: Not enough Controllers. Turbines require at least one
multiblock.validation.turbine.invalid_bl: Block is invalid for a Turbine interior. Only Rotor parts, metal blocks and empty space are allowed
%1$s is not valid for a Turbine's exterior
multiblock.validation.turbine.invalid_ro: Turbines require exactly one Rotor Bearing
multiblock.validation.turbine.block_must: This block must contain a Rotor. The Rotor must begin at the bearing and run the entire length of the Turbine
multiblock.validation.turbine.blades_too: Rotor Blades must be placed closer to the Rotor Bearing than all other parts inside a Turbine
multiblock.validation.turbine.metal_too_: Metal blocks must by placed further from the Rotor Bearing than all Rotor Blades
multiblock.validation.turbine.shaft_too_: The Rotor Shaft must extend the entire length of the Turbine interior
multiblock.validation.turbine.found_loos: Found %1$d Rotor blocks that are not attached to the main Rotor. All Rotor blocks must be in a column extending the entire length of the Turbine, starting from the bearing

multiblock.validation.turbine.invalid_me: Found %1$d metal blocks which were not in a ring around the Rotor. All metal blocks must be in rings, or partial rings, around the Rotor
multiblock.validation.turbine.invalid_ro: Rotor parts may only be placed in the turbine interior

multiblock.validation.turbine.mixed_powe: Only one type of energy system can be used in a Turbine
